results.title: NIKE Inc Company Profile - GlobalData
results.content: # NIKE Inc - Company Profile. The company markets these products under various brands such as Nike, Jordan and converse. Nike is headquartered in Beaverton, Oregon, the US. results.title: ABOUT US | NIKE COMPANY - WordPress.com
results.content: Nike, Inc. is an American multinational association that is involved in the design, development, manufacturing and worldwide marketing and sales of apparel,
